public interface FilterSettingsToggleableListScreen extends Screen
Specialized screen for toggleable lists.

  • Method Details

    • handleToggleableList

      default boolean handleToggleableList(String name, String[] items, boolean[] currentValue, Runnable[] toggle, Runnable reset)
      Handles the toggling of a list of items for filter settings.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the list being edited
      items - The items in the list
      currentValue - current boolean values for each item
      toggle - array of Runnables to toggle each item
      reset - Runnable to reset the list
      Returns:
      returns true if the screen should be shown again, false to go back
